reviewText: $15 for a 25 min video lol wow... informative but very short!
The video goes through the basics pretty well.  Not for experienced boxers but for those of us who like to work out on a heavy bag from time to time.
The quality of the video was not great I turned it off right away. Not worth it.

I ordered this for my brother who wanted to add some boxing basics to his workouts. He thought this was a great DVD because everything was demonstrated and explained clearly. (He tried another DVD first and found it disappointing; it was by a famous fighter who "talked more than he taught.")
I did like this DVD I would recommend it I would also buy the rest of the set if I could find it thanks
